Kia tahuri koutou ngā iwi mōhio o runga i te motu nei, ki te whakakaupapa mai i ngā waiata, me ngā apakura, me ngā pātere, me ngā pakanga a tētahi iwi ki tētahi iwi, tae noa ki ngā whakatauākī, me ō tātau whakapapa, me te hekenga mai o ō tātau waka i Hawaiki

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakatito', '.whakam\u0101oritanga: Kāore e whakapono (ki tā tētahi atu).
tauira: E hia kē ngā kī taurangi a tēnā tangata, he ngutu kau, koinei au e whakatito nei i ana kōrero.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakat\u0101t.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka koni haere, ka huri haere, ka pīrori haere rānei.
tauira: Kua whakatātaka haere ngā punua ngeru, kua pukutākaro.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakaioio', '.whakam\u0101oritanga: Kāore ōna mutunga, kāore e memeha, ka tū tonu, ka tū tonu, kāore hoki e taea te neke.
tauira: He rāhui whakaioio kua meatia ki taua moana e Te Papa Atawhai - e kore e hikina ahakoa he aha te kaupapa.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whai\u0101ipo.whakam\u0101oritanga: Tētahi o te tokorua e moe puku ana, arā, kāore e mana ana te moe tahi.
tauira: He whaiāipo noa, kāore anō rāua kia mārenatia.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whet\u016b',.whakam\u0101oritanga: Tētahi o ngā hanga ririki e hikohiko ana i te uma o Ranginui; tētahi o ngā hanga hikohiko i te uma o Ranginui e tuku ana i tōna anō aho, tae atu ki te rā.
tauira: E kīia ana ko Tāwera te whetū whakataki i te ata.
Otirā he tini, he mano ngā whetū kei te takiwā o te rangi, i waenganui o te rā me te ao
Ki tā te ao pūtaiao titiro, he whetū a Tamanuiterā, he aorangi a Pareārau.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakaputa', '.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka pure (i te tapu o te tūpāpaku) kua pā ki te tangata.
tauira: Kīhai i tika te whakaputa a Tūhoro i a ia i tōna raweketanga i a Tamatekapua

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakaatu', 'b.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi (i tētahi mahi) kia tahuri mai ai ētahi atu ki te titiro, ki te whakarongo.
tauira: Ka whakaaturia e ia, 'Ka hinga, ka hinga a Ngāti Ruanuku'

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakaw\u0101'.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka whakatakoto kōrero mō tētahi tangata, e mea ana kua hara ia.
tauira: Nā te kore i āta kitea nā wai i tāhae, ko wai tātou ki te whakawā i ētahi?

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whaiaro', 'br.whakam\u0101oritanga: Te tangata ake, tōna kotahi - taha kikokiko, taha wairua, taha tuakiri.
tauira: Patua iho, he kaka, ki tahaki tērā; ā ka pūehuehu, mā tana whaiaro tērā
Mēnā ko tōu whaiaro e whakaae ana, koinā. Kaua e arohia ngā whakaaro o ētahi atu.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakautu', 'b.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka whakapuaki kōrero ā-waha, ā-tuhi, ka mahi rānei i tētahi atu mahi hei whakaea i te pātai, te kōrero, te karanga, te tangi, te aha atu.
tauira: I a au ka pātai atu e aha ana ia i te pō rā, kāore ia i whakautu mai.
Māku e whakautu tana reta.
Mā wai e whakautu tana mihi?
Ka whakautua ana kupu hahani ki te ngeri.
Kia tere te whakautu i te waea, kaua e waiho kia tangi tonu.
Heoi anō tāna hei whakautu i te pātai, ko te hī o ngā pewa.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakahekeheke.whakam\u0101oritanga: E takoto tahi mai ana ētahi tāhei ki runga.
tauira: Me hāte tōkau hei hoa mō te tarau whakahekeheke.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakah\u012bh.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka whakaputa kupu whakaiti, whakahāwea i te tangata.
tauira: Kei waho rātou e whakahīhī ana ki te kaunihera nā te piki o ngā tāke kaunihera.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakaari', 'b.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka mahi kia āta kitea tētahi mea e tētahi atu.
tauira: Otirā kāore e pānuitia ana e taua nūpepa ngā kōrero katoa a te Minita Māori; engari ko ngā wāhi anake o ana kōrero e paingia ana e rātou kia whakaaria ki ngā Māori

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'whakat\u0113t.whakam\u0101oritanga: Ka māminga ki te patu i tētahi wāhi o te tinana ki te rākau kia pōhēhē ai te hoariri.
tauira: Ka whakatēteka atu tana ringa mauī, kātahi ka patua te upoko ki te ringa matau.

{'root_number':1, 'trunk':'wh\u0101ngote.whakam\u0101oritanga: He kararehe whāngai i āna punua ki te waiū.
